newsitem.title: FRANCE: French conscript held over rape of policewoman.
newsitem.headline: French conscript held over rape of policewoman.

text.p: A French judge on Friday remanded a 19-year-old conscript in custody on suspicion of raping and slashing a policewoman in mid-afternoon on a Paris commuter train, justice sources said.
The unnamed youth, who denies the charges, was formally placed under investigation on suspicion of gang rape and torture.
The sources said the policewoman identified him as one of five men who attacked her on her way home last October when she was off-duty, unarmed and out of uniform.

The men approached her in a deserted carriage of a regional express train in a suburb south of Paris. She said that when they opened her bag and saw she was a police officer, they attacked her with a linoleum cutter, cutting her face and hands before raping her.
She was found unconscious in her apartment four days later when her family became worried after not hearing from her.
